text: Nde Isreriŋ fara muuŋgiap, wari won rɨmgi gu wari won farir suigɨrga bigi, nde ntan hɨgi fhu. Mbe zav, Sainai mbɨkshɨma han kav, mbe vhava bakɨme garav, vhɨra gɨngɨna mbatɨga muuŋgi bigɨna garav, bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ bakɨme mbararav, mbe vhɨra mbararagi, buiva mbarɨv nzɨɨim, guma mbe buni nzuai. Mba gumgi gu mbigi ana kamthooŋ mbararagiap, mbe guigira rivgiap, khaŋ tɨgap Moses ga nzuai, “Nza wom mbu kamthooŋ mbarara thagi.”
